1.0.name: wordpress/silencesoft-disable-menu-items
1.0.description:
This plugin allows to disable menu items and hide them from menu without the need to delete them.

This plugin use phpQuery 0.9.5 from Tobiasz Cudnik * phpQuery is a server-side, chainable, CSS3 selector driven * Document Object Model (DOM) API based on jQuery JavaScript Library. http://code.google.com/p/phpquery/
